title: Skill Eval
description: Schema for Claude Code skill evaluation files. Each eval file tests a specific aspect of skill behavior.

skill.description: Skill name matching the directory name (e.g., 'api-scoring')

description.description: One-line description of what this eval validates

id.description: Unique test ID within this eval (e.g., 'valid-score-range')

prompt.description: The prompt or instruction to give the skill

setup.description: Optional setup/preconditions before running the test

input_files.description: Optional list of input file paths needed for the test

expectations.description: List of expected behaviors/outputs to verify

pass_criteria.description: Concise pass/fail criteria for the test

fail_indicators.description: Optional list of outputs that indicate failure
